order | payment

ORDER INFORMATION

To order CDs+digital files or download only,
you can go directly to our Ayler Records' digital store

To order CDs only, use the PayPal "add to cart" buttons next to releases on the home page or in the cd catalogue section

or
Drop us an email at: orders@ayler.com and include a list of purchases and your mailing address,
or
Make a direct payment via PayPal, payable to the e-mail address ayler.com@ayler.com
and include the list of purchases and mailing address in your PayPal message.
PayPal orders are shipped when payment is confirmed.

PRICES INCLUDE FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE.

Orders will be delivered by first class mail promptly after reception of the total amount.

A note on emails:
If you do not receive confirmation, paypal or bandcamp emails,
please check your bulk/spam mail folder.

 

DISTRIBUTION

Distributors or retailers for Ayler Records are as follows:

  • Denmark - Music By Mail - www.musicbymail.dk
  • France - Orkhestra International - www.orkhestra.fr
  • Italy - Jazz Today Distribution - www.jtdistribution.net
  • Japan - Disk Union Co., Ltd. - www.diskunion.co.jp
  • Poland - Multikulti Project S.C. - www.multikulti.com
  • Spain & Portugal - Distrijazz - www.distrijazz.com
  • USA - Squidco - www.squidco.com
